workflow.name: Download watermark-free TikTok videos to Google Drive with automated sheets logging
workflow.description:
## üì• TikTok to MP4 Converter with Google Drive & Sheets

**Convert TikTok videos to MP4 , MP3 (without watermark), upload to Google Drive, and log conversion attempts into Google Sheets automatically ‚Äî powered by [TikTok Download Audio Video API](https://rapidapi.com/PrineshPatel/api/tiktok-download-audio-video).**

---

## üìù Description

This **n8n automation** accepts a TikTok video URL via a form, sends it to the [TikTok Download Audio Video API](https://rapidapi.com/PrineshPatel/api/tiktok-download-audio-video), downloads the watermark-free MP4, uploads it to Google Drive, and logs the result (success/failure) into Google Sheets.

---

## üß© Node-by-Node Overview

| # | Node                          | Functionality                                                                 |
|---|-------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| 1 | üü¢ **Form Trigger**            | Displays a form for user input of TikTok video URL.                          |
| 2 | üåê **TikTok RapidAPI Request** | Calls the [TikTok Downloader API](https://rapidapi.com/PrineshPatel/api/tiktok-download-audio-video) to get the MP4 link. |
| 3 | üîç **If Condition**            | Checks if the API response status is "success".                              |
| 4 | ‚¨áÔ∏è **MP4 Downloader**          | Downloads the video file using the returned "no watermark" MP4 URL.          |
| 5 | ‚òÅÔ∏è **Upload to Google Drive**  | Uploads the video file to Google Drive root folder.                          |
| 6 | üîë **Set Google Drive Permission** | Makes the file publicly shareable via link.                                  |
| 7 | üìÑ **Google Sheets (Success)** | Logs TikTok URL + public Drive link into a Google Sheet.                     |
| 8 | ‚è±Ô∏è **Wait Node**               | Delays to prevent rapid write operations on error.                           |
| 9 | üìë **Google Sheets (Failure)** | Logs failed attempts with `Drive_URL = N/A`.                                 |

---

## ‚úÖ Use Cases

- üì≤ Social media managers downloading user-generated content  
- üß† Educators saving TikTok content for offline lessons  
- üíº Agencies automating short-form video curation  
- ü§ñ Workflow automation demonstrations with n8n  

---

## üéØ Key Benefits

- ‚úîÔ∏è **MP4 without watermark** via [TikTok Download Audio Video API](https://rapidapi.com/PrineshPatel/api/tiktok-download-audio-video)  
- ‚úîÔ∏è **Automated Google Drive upload & shareable links**  
- ‚úîÔ∏è **Centralized logging** in Google Sheets  
- ‚úîÔ∏è **Error handling and retry-safe structure**  
- ‚úîÔ∏è Fully customizable and extendable within **n8n**  

---

üí° *Ideal for anyone looking to automate TikTok video archiving with full control over file storage and access.*

## üîê How to Get Your API Key for the TikTok Download Audio Video API

1. Go to üëâ  [TikTok Download Audio Video API - RapidAPI](https://rapidapi.com/PrineshPatel/api/tiktok-download-audio-video) 
2. Click **"Subscribe to Test"** (you may need to sign up or log in).
3. Choose a pricing plan (there‚Äôs a free tier for testing).
4. After subscribing, click on the **"Endpoints"** tab.
5. Your **API Key** will be visible in the **"x-rapidapi-key"** header.

üîë Copy and paste this key into the `httpRequest` node in your workflow.

---
Create your **free n8n account** and set up the workflow in just a few minutes using the link below:

üëâ [Start Automating with n8n](https://n8n.partnerlinks.io/7fuarh1e6dz5)

parameters.content:
## üü¢ **1. On form submission**
- **Purpose:** Acts as the trigger for the workflow.  
- **Functionality:** Displays a form with a single field (`URL`) where users can enter the TikTok video link.  
- **Output:** Passes the entered URL to the next node for processing.

## üåê **2. Tiktok RapidAPI Request**
- **Purpose:** Fetch downloadable MP4 link.  
- **Functionality:** Sends a `POST` request to **Tiktok Video Downloader API**, passing the URL from the form.  
- **Output:** Receives a JSON response containing downloadable media links.

## üîç **3. If**
- **Purpose:** Check for API errors.  
- **Functionality:** Evaluates if the response contains an `error` field.  
- **Output:** 
  - ‚úÖ **True Path:** Proceeds to download the MP4.  
  - ‚ùå **False Path:** Goes to error handling (Wait + Sheets logging).

## ‚¨áÔ∏è **4. MP4 Downloader**
- **Purpose:** Download the video file.  
- **Functionality:** Uses the media URL from the previous API response to download the MP4 video.  
- **Output:** Stores the raw MP4 binary for upload.

-

## ‚òÅÔ∏è **5. Upload To Google Drive**
- **Purpose:** Store video in Google Drive.  
- **Functionality:** Uploads the downloaded MP4 into the specified Drive folder.  
- **Output:** Returns a file ID for the uploaded file.

## üîë **6. Google Drive Set Permission**
- **Purpose:** Make the file publicly accessible.  
- **Functionality:** Sets file permissions to `Anyone with the link can view`.  
- **Output:** Provides a sharable `webViewLink`.

## üìÑ **7. Google Sheets**
- **Purpose:** Log successful conversions.  
- **Functionality:** Appends a row with:
  - `URL` ‚Üí Original Tiktok link  
  - `Drive_URL` ‚Üí Sharable Google Drive MP4 link  
- **Output:** Saves a permanent log of successful downloads.

## ‚è±Ô∏è **8. Wait**
- **Purpose:** Delay before logging failures.  
- **Functionality:** Pauses workflow execution to avoid instant sheet logging when API errors occur.  
- **Output:** Prevents rapid consecutive writes to Google Sheets.

## üìë **9. Google Sheets Append Row**
- **Purpose:** Log failed conversions.  
- **Functionality:** Appends a row with:
  - `URL` ‚Üí Original Tiktok link  
  - `Drive_URL` ‚Üí `N/A` (indicating download failure)  
- **Output:** Tracks failed attempts separately.

# üì• TikTok to MP4 Converter Automation

This **n8n** workflow automates the process of converting TikTok videos to MP4 format, uploading them to Google Drive, and logging the results into Google Sheets.

## ‚úÖ Features

- üîó Accepts TikTok video URLs via a public form  
- üåê Uses [RapidAPI TikTok Downloader](https://rapidapi.com/PrineshPatel/api/tiktok-download-audio-video) to fetch downloadable MP4 links  
- ‚¨áÔ∏è Downloads the MP4 video (without watermark)  
- ‚òÅÔ∏è Uploads the video to Google Drive  
- üîì Sets file permission to "Anyone with the link can view"  
- üìÑ Appends successful conversions (URL + Drive link) to Google Sheets  
- ‚ùå Logs failed conversions with `Drive_URL` marked as `N/A`  
- ‚è±Ô∏è Includes a delay before logging failures to avoid rapid sheet writes  

## üìä Outputs

- **Google Drive Link**: Publicly shareable MP4 video URL  
- **Google Sheets Log**: Permanent record of all conversion attempts

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
